page.title: Connect to <0>Citadel</0> node
page.instructions: This currently doesn't work if 2FA is enabled.

page.title: Connect to <0>Umbrel</0> node
page.instructions: 1. In your Lightning Node dashboard go to <0>Connect wallet</0><1/>2. Select <0>REST (Tor)</0> or <0>REST (Local Network)</0> mode<1/>3. Copy the <0>lndconnect URL</0> and paste it below

page.title: Connect to <0>myNode</0>
page.instructions: On your myNode homepage click on the <0>Wallet</0> button for your <0>lightning</0> service.<1/> Now click on the <0>Pair Wallet</0> button under the <0>Status</0> tab. Enter your password when prompted.<1/> Select the dropdown menu and choose a pairing option. Depending on your setup you can either use the <0>lightning (REST + Local IP)</0> connection or the <0>lightning (REST + Tor)</0> connection.

page.title: Connect to <0>StartOS</0>
page.instructions: On your StartOS dashboard click on the <0>Lightning Network Daemon</0> service.<1/>Select the <0>Properties</0> tab.<1/>Now copy the <0>LND Connect REST URL.</0>

page.title: Connect to your <0>RaspiBlitz</0> node
page.instructions1: Follow these steps:<1/> 1. <0>SSH</0> into your <0>Raspiblitz</0><1/>2. Select <0>Connect Apps & Show Credentials</0> from the list<1/><0/>3. Choose <0>Connect Alby to this node</0><1/>4. Press <0>OK</0> to display the connection credentials<1/><1/>Copy and paste the <0>REST API host</0> or the <0>.onion</0> address to connect through Tor into the input below.
page.instructions2: Copy the (admin) <0>macaroon</0> into the input below.

token.label: Enter your API key
token.info:
To connect your wallet generate an API key in the <0>Blink Dashboard (dashboard.blink.sv):
- log in with email or phone number if you are using Blink already
- if you have no account yet can create a new one by logging in with a phone number
- create a new key on the API Keys tab
- give it a Name and choose the Read and Write Scope
- leave the default no expiry or choose a long timeframe to avoid needing to reconnect your wallet periodically
- copy the key (starting with blink_ ) and paste it to the textbox below.

The integration currently only supports using the BTC wallet.

token.label: Enter your Access token
token.info:
The {{label}} integration with Alby is in alpha and only recommended for advanced users.

You can grab your Access token by going into the mobile app, clicking on the settings icon, and then tapping 3 times on the build number to open the developer menu.

The access token can be copied from here.

errors.missing_token: Access token missing, couldn't log in.
errors.invalid_token: Authorization failed. Please check your API key and try again.

page.instructions: Navigate to your BTCPayServer and log in as an admin. Go to Server Settings > Services > LND REST - See information. Then Click "See QR Code information" and copy the QR Code data. Paste it below:

page.instructions: Make sure you have Core Lightning version 0.12.0 or newer, the commando plugin is running and your node is accessible over the lightning network. Create a rune by running 'lightning-cli commando-rune'.

account_view.no_mnemonic_hint: 💡 You don't have a Master Key yet. <0>Click here to create your Master Key and unlock these settings.

mnemonic.title: 🔑 Key Management
mnemonic.existing_nostr_key_notice: ℹ️ This account already has a nostr private key set and will not be derived from this Master Key. You can manage your Nostr key from your account settings.

generate.title: Generate new Master Key
generate.description: Master Key allows you to interact with various protocols such as: Nostr, base layer of Bitcoin or LNURL-Auth.
generate.confirm: I've backed up the recovery phrase to my Master Key in a private and secure place.
generate.error_confirm: Please confirm that you have backed up the recovery phrase.

backup.title: Back up your recovery phrase
backup.warning: ⚠️ Don't forget to back up your recovery phrase! Not backing it up might result in permanently losing access to your Master Key, Nostr identity or assets you manage with this key.
backup.description: Write down the recovery phrase to be able to restore your Master Key on a new device or in case you lose access to your account.

items.keys: Master Key allows you to interact with various protocols such as: Nostr, Liquid or base layer of Bitcoin.
items.recovery_phrase: You can always access your Master Key by using it's recovery phrase.
items.words: Recovery phrase is set of 12 words that works like a password, however it can't be changed or reset in case it's lost.
items.storage: Make sure to write it down somewhere safe and private!

import.title: Import your Master Key
import.description: Use the recovery phrase to import your Master Key into Alby.

lnurl.title: Login with Lightning
lnurl.use_mnemonic: Use Master Key for logging into lightning-powered apps (LNURL Auth)

network.title: Network
network.subtitle: Choose network to derive addresses and decode bitcoin and liquid transactions

nostr.title: Nostr
nostr.hint: is a simple and open protocol that aims to create censorship-resistant social networks. Nostr works with cryptographic keys. To publish something you sign it with your key and send it to multiple relays. You can use Alby to manage your Nostr key. Many Nostr applications will then allow you to simply use the key from the Alby extension.

settings.label: Nostr Settings
settings.title: Nostr Settings
settings.description: Derive Nostr keys from your Master Key or import your existing private key by pasting it in the "Nostr Private Key" field.
settings.imported_key_warning: ⚠️ You're currently using an imported or randomly generated Nostr key. Your Nostr private key cannot be restored by your recovery phrase, so remember to back up your Nostr private key separately.
settings.can_restore: ✅ Nostr key derived from your Master Key
settings.no_secret_key: 💡 You don't have a Master Key yet. <0>Click here to create your Master Key and derive your Nostr keys.

setup.title: Setup your Nostr keys
setup.description: Choose If you'd like to create a new Nostr account (a pair of private and public keys) or import an existing one.
setup.description2: Every Nostr account created in Alby comes with a <0>Recovery Phrase</0> – a set of 12 words that always allow you to regain access to your Nostr private keys.

website_enhancements.title: Website enhancements
website_enhancements.subtitle: Tipping enhancements for Twitter, YouTube, etc.

lnurl_auth.title: LNURL-Auth
lnurl_auth.hint: is a generic authentication protocol. It authenticates the user using digital signatures. The protocol does not require any other identifying information such as passwords, emails, usernames, or similar. With Alby you can use your lightning accounts to securely login to websites. To be compatible with other wallets we had to make a few changes that you can configure here. <0>Ideally all those options are OFF.</0> Use them only if you have old accounts.

legacy_lnurl_auth_202207.title: Legacy LNURL-Auth
legacy_lnurl_auth_202207.subtitle: The key generation for LNURL-auth has changed (July 2022). Alby was not compatible with other implementations. This was changed, but now different login keys are used. If you used LNURL-auth to login before you can still enable the old method. This option will be removed later, make sure to switch to the new login.

legacy_lnurl_auth.title: Legacy signing for LNDhub and LNbits
legacy_lnurl_auth.subtitle: Message signing and login with LNDhub (e.g. BlueWallet) and LNbits accounts has been changed (March 2022). If you logged in with these accounts you can still enable the old signing method. This option will be removed later, make sure to switch to the new login.
